plot: Cheryl "Action" Jackson transforms the lives of families struggling in today's economy by blessing them with useful gifts that aid everyday living.
plot_en: Cheryl "Action" Jackson transforms the lives of families struggling in today's economy by blessing them with useful gifts that aid everyday living.

title: Take Action
